title: Pocus AI Account Plan Generator
description:
Generate robust sales account plans in a few seconds. Pocus reads 10ks, websites, news, listens to podcasts, and more to create a strategic account plan just for you. It also combines your value props to suggest how you might pitch the account. Like chatGPT but more powerful, built just for sellers. 

Try V2 of our AI Strategy tool for free for 14 days! bit.ly/aistrategyupdate
